DarkMouse::
Her jaw dropped. "Magnus? Maximal? My friends?" She wasn't sure if 
she was just insulted or merely misunderstood. "Hold up. No maximal 
is a friend of mine there pal. I am a Predacon. Proud and True. I 
used to serve under Megatron. Untill he got killed. I then served 
under KitKat. I may not be the brightest electrode on the console, 
but I'm a pred and nothing will change that program. Got it?"  She 
tried to calm down. "OK, so what's up on the bridge? I wanna see how 
this baby operates."  She unknowing rubbed herhands together on the 
idea of learning new technology. She followed Galvatron. She wondered 
who this Shredder was whom Galvatron was communicating to.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron frowned. He doubted he was going to be able to keep her 
for long. 
> "Magnus is probably runnign around with his maximals...." he 
trailed off. He 
> had nothing to say. She was obviously uncomfortable. He stood up. " 
I must go 
> to the bridge to can join me we can scan for your friends or there 
is a 
> quarters vacant down there." he pointed. "You can rest there if you 
need to" 
> he walked off towards the bridge. he saw Guiledart workin hard in 
the lab. He 
> comm'd shredder. "Shredder whats your situation?"
